name: Eiddilig Gor

attributes.attribute: One of the Three Enchanters of Britain
could escape any pursuer by changing his form into any being of earth, air, or water

sources: Monaghan, Patricia. The Encyclopedia of Celtic Mythology and Folklore. Checkmark Books, 2008.
text: A British mythological figure by the name of Eiddilig Gor possessed the ability to transform into any creature of earth, air, or water in order to evade capturers. This Dwarf was one of the Three Enchanters of Britain.
